svg.content: <mxfile><diagram name="配信・記録層システム関連図" id="streaming-recording-system"></diagram></mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 119px; margin-left: 1px;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(77, 77, 77), rgb(171, 171, 171));
fill: light-dark(rgb(77, 77, 77), rgb(171, 171, 171)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(77, 77, 77), rgb(171, 171, 171));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 328px; margin-left: 366px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

div.div: メタデータ送信

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
